en.title: 4,000 Attend Dr Emoto's Seminar In Bangkok 04th April 2010! (2)

meta.description:
A HUGE crowd of 4,000 FE Leaders, Members, VIPs and invited guests turned up at JJ Mall, Bangkok, on 04th April 2010 to listen to world renowned scientist Dr Masaru Emoto's keynote lecture on "The Power Of Scalar Energised Water". VIPs who attended include General Dato Kitti Rattanachaya (former Army Commander of Southern Thailand), Prof Dr Wichit Bunyahotara (Scientist and former Head of Chemistry Department, Chulalongkorn University), Dr Sombat Metthanee (renowned Thai actor), Pratan Sutabutra (father in law of Thai Finance Minister), Police Major General Angkoon Arthornphatai, Surachai Sombatcharoen (well known singer) and many more.
Highlights Of The Event Include:
meta.keyword: Dinner, Malaysia, Laos, Miss Malaysia, Natasha, FE, Directors, Mock Cheque
meta.author: KLHunter
